meanings.definition: The act of turning something into fiction.
meanings.sent1: The fictionization of the historical event made it more interesting to read about.
meanings.sent2: Her fictionization of her childhood memories turned into a bestselling novel.
meanings.sent3: The fictionization of the boring meeting made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His fictionization of reality created a whole new world in his stories.
meanings.sent5: The fictionization of the old legend brought it to life in a new way.

meanings.sent1: The fictionization of the true story added drama to the movie.
meanings.sent2: The fictionization of the character made it more relatable to the audience.
meanings.sent3: The fictionization of the recipe made it sound like a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: Her fictionization of the city turned it into a mystical land in her book.
meanings.sent5: The fictionization of the adventure made it seem like a fairy tale come true.
